fr.ign.artiscales.goal

Class ConsolidationDivision

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ign.artiscales.goal.ConsolidationDivision

  • public class ConsolidationDivision
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation following this goal merge together the contiguous marked parcels to create zones. The chosen parcel division process (OBB by default) is then applied on each created zone.
    Author:
    Maxime Colomb

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEBUG
      If true, will save all the intermediate results in the temporary folder
      static boolean OVERWRITESHAPEFILES
      If true, overwrite the output saved shapefiles.
      static java.lang.String PROCESS
      The process used to divide the parcels
      static boolean SAVEINTERMEDIATERESULT
      If true, will save a shapefile containing only the simulated parcels in the temporary folder.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection consolidationDivision(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcels, java.io.File tmpFolder, double maximalArea, double minimalArea, double maximalWidth, double streetWidth, int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
      Method that merges the contiguous marked parcels into zones and then split those zones with a given parcel division algorithm (by default, the Oriented Bounding Box) overload of consolidationDivision(SimpleFeatureCollection, File, double, double, double, double, int, double, int) for a single road size usage
      static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection consolidationDivision(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcels, java.io.File tmpFolder, double maximalArea, double minimalArea, double maximalWidth, double smallStreetWidth, int largeStreetLevel, double largeStreetWidth, int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
      Method that merges the contiguous marked parcels into zones and then split those zones with a given parcel division algorithm (by default, the Oriented Bounding Box)

    • Field Detail

      • DEBUG

        public static boolean DEBUG
        If true, will save all the intermediate results in the temporary folder

      • PROCESS

        public static java.lang.String PROCESS
        The process used to divide the parcels

      • SAVEINTERMEDIATERESULT

        public static boolean SAVEINTERMEDIATERESULT
        If true, will save a shapefile containing only the simulated parcels in the temporary folder.

      • OVERWRITESHAPEFILES

        public static boolean OVERWRITESHAPEFILES
        If true, overwrite the output saved shapefiles. If false, happend the simulated parcels to a potential already existing shapefile.

    • Method Detail

      • consolidationDivision

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection consolidationDivision(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcels,
                                                                                     java.io.File tmpFolder,
                                                                                     double maximalArea,
                                                                                     double minimalArea,
                                                                                     double maximalWidth,
                                                                                     double streetWidth,
                                                                                     int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that merges the contiguous marked parcels into zones and then split those zones with a given parcel division algorithm (by default, the Oriented Bounding Box) overload of consolidationDivision(SimpleFeatureCollection, File, double, double, double, double, int, double, int) for a single road size usage
        Parameters:
        parcels - The parcels to be merged and cut. Must be marked with the SPLIT filed (see markParcelIntersectMUPOutput for example, with the method concerning MUP-City's output)
        tmpFolder - A temporary folder where will be saved intermediate results
        maximalArea - Area under which a parcel won"t be anymore cut
        minimalArea - Area under which a polygon won't be kept as a parcel
        maximalWidth - The width of parcel connection to street network under which the parcel won"t be anymore cut
        streetWidth - the width of generated street network. this @overload is setting a single size for those roads
        decompositionLevelWithoutStreet - Number of the final row on which street generation doesn't apply
        Returns:
        the set of parcel with decomposition
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • consolidationDivision

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection consolidationDivision(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcels,
                                                                                     java.io.File tmpFolder,
                                                                                     double maximalArea,
                                                                                     double minimalArea,
                                                                                     double maximalWidth,
                                                                                     double smallStreetWidth,
                                                                                     int largeStreetLevel,
                                                                                     double largeStreetWidth,
                                                                                     int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that merges the contiguous marked parcels into zones and then split those zones with a given parcel division algorithm (by default, the Oriented Bounding Box)
        Parameters:
        parcels - The parcels to be merged and cut. Must be marked with the SPLIT filed (see markParcelIntersectMUPOutput for example, with the method concerning MUP-City's output)
        tmpFolder - : A temporary folder where will be saved intermediate results
        maximalArea - : Area under which a parcel won"t be anymore cut
        minimalArea - : Area under which a polygon won't be kept as a parcel
        maximalWidth - : The width of parcel connection to street network under which the parcel won"t be anymore cut
        smallStreetWidth - : the width of small street network segments
        largeStreetLevel - : level of decomposition after which the streets are considered as large streets
        largeStreetWidth - : the width of large street network segments
        decompositionLevelWithoutStreet - : Number of the final row on which street generation doesn't apply
        Returns:
        the set of parcel with decomposition
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
